verbose_text: GSK3beta inhibition in glioblastoma cells induces c-Myc-dependent recruitment of DNA methylation transferase 3A (DNMT3A), leading to O 6 -methylguanine DNA methyltransferase (MGMT) promoter methylation and consequent silencing of MGMT expression, a predictor for resistance to temozolomide, in tumor cells in patients with recurrent glioblastoma XREF_BIBR.
